title: Bad, real bad!
comment: After changing to another currency the app keeps crashing. Even after clearing all app data and trying to login, it crashes. Glad I didn't transfer more than a few bits to this.

title: Favourite
comment: Definitely the best android wallet I've used so far.

title: The only mobile wallet I trust with my Bitcoins
comment: The only Bitcoin wallet I feel comfortable using on my phone - it has the best combination of convenience and security. Serves as an awesome companion to the dssktop app.

title: Love it!!!
comment: I know I can use my Trezor but how can I pair my Trezor (Hardware Wallet) with Greenbits?? Thanks :):):)
Currently you have to pair it using the GreenAddress app on desktop (you can find it on the Chrome Store or on GitHub)

title: First TREZOR android wallet
comment: I love being able to use my TREZOR as a hot wallet with greenbits. I only wish that there was a way to create a 1 of 1 wallet with it if you wanted. I know green address is all about the multisig 2 of 2 or 2 of 3 but I would still like the option.

title: Extremely buggy. Unusable
comment: I thought the GA 2FA issues were limited to the testnet app but same story: confirmation of QR code crashes on galaxy S4. ZERO STARS

The Google Auth 2FA issue has been fixed in version 1.44, we apologize for the inconvenience.
Hope you find the newer version of your liking and please let us know if you have any feedback or suggestion.

title: Fantastic work
comment: This is shaping up to be a really amazing bitcoin wallet designed with security in mind and hardware implementation. Still having issues though when sending, crashes every time (transactions go through).

title: Very dumbed down
comment: Prefer normal client over this one that lets me import wallets and other functionality. Notice I saw said multi sig was in this but can only send to single address as far as I can tell.

The wallet by default is 2of2 and allows to use 2of3 multisig subaccounts . The app can send to any address, regardless of P2SH or normal addresses. Let us know if there's any question or feedback. Sweeping functionality is supported so one can import and transfer bitcoin from private keys to the new wallet.
